name: Spike Cat
description:
Spike Cat is a game made during a Game Jam with the theme: "What doesn't kill you makes you stronger".

No risk, no reward... Spikes will normally kill you, BUT - pick up an ability first, and hitting the spikes will trigger it! Watch your step and bounce your way to the finish line without dying!

DEV NOTE: This is a very early prototype. All mechanics work as intended, but the game feel is not fine-tuned and the level design is not completed as of this iteration.
